About 30,000 people were living there in 2021. The municipality of Lichtenvoorde joined the municipality of Groenlo on 1 January 2005. Groenlo was renamed Oost Gelre on 20 May 2006. == References == * Plaatsengids.nl Category:2006 establishments in the Netherlands
